description: Norris, a loyal retainer of the aristocratic Saharin family, supervises Zeon`s frontlines in Southeast Asia and makes sure that the enemy stays far away from Ginias`s secret development base. A dedicated soldier and skilled mobile suit pilot, Norris` devotion to the Zeon cause is tinged with affection for the Saharin family - particularly Aina, whom he effectively raised himself and now regards as a surrogate daughter.
name: Norris Packard
